meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sociable or friendly, especially within a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: Her clubbinesses shone through as she warmly welcomed everyone to the party.
meanings.sent2: The clubbinesses of the team made working together a joy.
meanings.sent3: His clubbinesses was so contagious that even the shyest person felt included.
meanings.sent4: The clubbinesses in the office was like a warm blanket on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The clubbinesses of the neighborhood made it a wonderful place to live.

meanings.definition: The tendency or practice of forming exclusive social groups or cliques.
meanings.sent1: The clubbinesses of the students made it hard for new kids to join their group.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the clubbinesses of the book club, where only a few were allowed in.
meanings.sent3: The clubbinesses of the cats in the alley was like a secret society.
meanings.sent4: The clubbinesses of the elite club was like a fortress, keeping others out.
meanings.sent5: The clubbinesses of the clique was so strong, it felt like a force field.
